LightningComponentBundle.description: Renders a flow so that the appropriate task can be completed.

property.name: flowApiName
property.label: Flow API Name
property.description: The API name of the flow that should be rendered.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: The title that should be displayed on the card. Defaults to Manage Task.

property.name: cardIcon
property.label: Card Icon
property.description: The icon that should be displayed on the card. Defaults to standard:task. For more, see https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/
